FuncDef: The reset multicast-rui statistic all command clears statistics about IGMP messages of access users on Routers enabled with multicast hot backup.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a multicast RUI scenario, the master and slave Routers duplicate IGMP messages from each other sent by a terminal and collect statistics about IGMP messages. To clear statistics about IGMP messages backed up on Routers, run the reset multicast-rui statistic all command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
